These nodes have job sites, such as a potato farm. You can go to a worker manager in town an request a worker. The worker is added to your list, and you can assign him to continually work at the node. As he works, he slowly loses energy, which is replenished with beer.,Additionally, you can assign buildings to storage (more storage space in town), crafting (uses items in storage to make items), or banks (invests gold bars to generate a slightly higher amount of silver over time). You can also use it as residence for your own personal use
